title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing OK, an error message appears: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This issue occurs because setting the output location and classpath are currently separate operations, resulting in an illegal state when the first operation is set.
EB: To resolve this bug (4974), the setting of classpath and output location should be combined into one operation. Additionally, the error message should be improved to say '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software
2. Go to the settings or preferences section
3. Set the classpath
4. Set the output location
5. Press OK
6. Observe the error message 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'
